message.body: Chicas- still stuck at hospital! Yuck!!! Will miss class- see you sat night! Can't wait! Xoxo.
I can't do class next week- bc I will be in barcelona- but I could do saturday april 9.
Saturday 9th at 2! Same tarea.... We just talked about the wedding all class :-)
Ha!!! Oh too bad- that's good vocab!
Do we have spanish today?
Yes? I'm 90% sure....
Class next week? I can do any day but Wednesday next week
Yes- sounds great! Xoxo.
I will bring vino tonight!
Yay!
Is there a reason we always drink red wine?
Haha, I am ok with white :-)
I mean- I got chardonney and now realize we never drink it.
It's spring, time to bust out the vino blanco!
Fyi. Catharine wrote me a note of thanks and love.
Yay!
Chicas!!! Lo siento! I totally forgot about class tonight and I am on my way to DC for a wedding! Yikes. Next week I can do anytime on thursday night.
Aw, ok, next week!
6:30 next Thursday!
Hola chicas- class at 630? Right? Also are we celebrating cinco?
Yes and yes!
Ole!
I will bring vino.
What time is spanish tonight?
No spanish today- resched for next week.
Gracias!
Chicas- can we do 8 at banana leaf? I have early day tomorrow.
Pedro ditched us again.
No love!
Oh yes- only me and susie right now. Tragic.
Oh no!
Hey lady- jillian is coming to my place tomorrow at 10 for brunch! Join us!
Change that to thurs at 10 am.
Can't, have work. Thanks tho!
besos galore for your opening night, amiga xoxoxoxo.
Gracias chica!
Your child video on fringe.org is amazing. Seriously.
See you tomorrow night!
WHO ARE YOU???
I was emailing my friends links to the show and I found it. I should also add that I was procrastination doing a presentation.
Haha, wow, can't believe you found that...yay!
Ok- this question is relevant- is it safe to walk to circle of hope or should I taxi.
It's fine to walk there, not that far. Get there early, we're gonna sell out again!
No way! Ok- good to know! We will be there by 630.
See ya then!
Class at 7:30 on Monday!
Oh boy- this won't be pretty.
Nope :-)
I am nervous for class. Be there soon.
Okay- fair enough. If I am with susie- I may fake laryngitis.
Train running late, should be there 10 or 15 late
I hope so.
We get Pedro, no?????
...aaaaand, I can't do Thursday, have rehearsal for a Halloween cabaret. Week of the 31st I can do Monday or Tuesday. Sorry, will call school tomorrow
Monday or tues are fine with me.
Si- but I didn't finish my tarea.
Still on for tonight?
Yep.
It was just that sheet from the week before right?
That was the hardest spanish homework ever.
it's just ridiculous. A shameful assignment. All I know is that people hugged and ate and cheered and stared.
Seriously
Oh and maybe there was a ghost.
School can't do Thursday, Monday at 5:30 work?
Hmm- no- I am at doylestown for hours on monday- won't be home until 6ish. I can do 730 and try for 630.
Ok, I'll call and find out
Solid!
Xoxo.
Tuesday 29th at 7:30?
Tim can't. Will email everyone tomorrow to figure it out!
When is our spanish class?
They just returned my call on sat, still playing phone tag...hopefully will get in touch tonight
Okay- perfecto.
Next Tuesday, 7:30!
Besos amiga. I have jeremy's inserts.
hey- you never told me where jeremy's foot hurt?
Bingo, when I poked it on the spot you showed me. Thx so much for the inserts! And for coming!
Oh please don't mention it. It will take him about two weeks to start feeling better. He can ice it and take ibuprofen with food as needed (600mg every 8 hours
As needed ) to calm down inflammation.
It was an incredible performance. I can't believe how much we laughed! My friend Lisa just kept saying what an amazing couple you guys are!
Oh, yr too kind! Thx so much, I'm glad you enjoyed it!
What is our homework question?
Oh shit, I need to do that. #3
Can't do Monday now, sorry. I'll call the school and leave a MSG
Damnit, I can come now. Will confirm with school.
hey lady- no sweat!
I won't be able to come tonight.
I am in dc.
Until 8pm.
Did pedro even schedule us for tonight? Or just next thursday?
I thought he did?? I will check with school.
Yes, we were scheduled, I left a MSG that we were canceling haven't heard back since
And Tim dropped us, he felt like we were too advanced for him! Ha, we're good fakers.
Hahahaha- when I was an RA in college, I was suppose to have a roommate but I didn't, and girls would show up to see the room, but I would insist that my
Residents were really loud and crazy, and my hallmates would be really loud at that moment. It's kind of the way we are with tim- we brought our spanish A game
To bully him out. Xoxoxo.
His crazy accent was only to hide his insecurities. Yr so devious :-)
When do we have class again?
I am free whenever
Just ran into elizabeth- can you do next tues
Maybe...I need to look at my finances, I am super broke right now. Will let you know tomorrow!
Ok- no problem.
Hey lady friend, what's your status for class this week? Can you do Tuesday?
Sigh. I will call the school and tell them I guess, but I have no money for classes right now. So sorry... I will by the middle/end of feb I think.
Hey chicha!!!! What's our class status? I miss you tons!

Heya lady! I miss you too...unfortunately I'm still broke and am only working 8 days this month...then we're closed a week in march...agh. Sorry :-( there's just no way I can afford it right now. I'll for sure let you know when my fortunes change!
Okay- oh bother! I will let school know! I am going to start working at a spanish clinic in south philly once a week too- I will let you know what night.
That's awesome!
Hey chica! I miss you!
I have an extra ticket to the phil orch chamber concert tomorrow at 3 at kimmel. Want to go?
Miss you too! I have rehearsal until 5 tomorrow tho :-( thanks so much for thinking of me! Maybe we can have a brunch soon?
Hey chica! I miss you. What's our plan with spanish class? If we are dumping it, I need to ask for my money back from elizabeth. Let's get coffee or brunch soon

Lady! You me too. I've been crazy, and am leaving on tour in two weeks. But! Good news is I'm making $ again finally. So. If you wanna start classes again I might be able to in June. No time for coffee/brunch prolly until I get back tho :-(
